alert.note: Alert for Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball; Morrill; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 11:43PM CST until January 03 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Scotts Bluff, Morrill, Banner, Kimball, and Cheyenne counties in the southern Nebraska Panhandle. This includes but is not limited to Scottsbluff and Gering, Bridgeport, Harrisburg, Kimball, and Sidney. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and significantly reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow. In areas of more significant icing, isolated power outages and downed tree limbs are possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball; Morrill; Scotts Bluff
